scripts.postcompile:rust:wasm: mkdir -p native/pi_est_wasm/debug/; find native/pi_est_browser/target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/debug/deps/ -type f -name "*.wasm" | xargs -I {} cp {} native/pi_est_wasm/debug/pi_est.wasm; find native/pi_est_browser/target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/debug/ -type f ! -name "*.asm.js" -name "*.js" | xargs -I {} cp {} native/pi_est_wasm/debug/pi_est.js
scripts.postcompile:rust:wasm:release: mkdir -p native/pi_est_wasm/release/; find native/pi_est_browser/target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/release/deps/ -type f -name "*.wasm" | xargs -I {} cp {} native/pi_est_wasm/release/pi_est.wasm; find native/pi_est_browser/target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/release/ -type f ! -name "*.asm.js" -name "*.js" | xargs -I {} cp {} native/pi_est_wasm/release/pi_est.js
scripts.compile:coffeescript:web: npm run compile:coffeescript -- -t [ coffeeify --bare false --header false ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV browser_debug ] -o target/web/bundle.js
scripts.compile:coffeescript:node: npm run compile:coffeescript -- -t [ coffeeify --bare true --header false ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV node_debug ] -o target/node/bundle.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ target/ build/ native/pi_est_asmjs/ native/pi_est_wasm/
